contentTypes.name: Student
contentTypes.description: The student bio, name, contact links, etc.

validations.message: Email must be of type email
Dimensions must be at least 500 x 500 px
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, inline entry, and heading 2 nodes are allowed
CV Must be a PDF Format

contentTypes.name: Project
contentTypes.description: A project is something that is core to your research, for example, a project may have multiple speaking events or publications associated with it.

validations.message: Upload an image only (e.g. jpg, png, webp)
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed
Profile link must be a url to an external website
Descriptions should be short and less than 500 characters

settings.helpText: Write a short bio for your website
Very brief bio (e.g. Sociologist probing food system inequalities)
A brief summary about your project that will be displayed on the home page.
Determines if project will be featured on home page
Project will show up in navbar.
Link to program, award, or announcement
First and Last Name (e.g. John Doe)
Feature publication on the home page
Date and time the event starts
If internal link just use "/projects" if external link use "https://example.com"
